game.name: Halliwell's Garden
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build a thriving garden by day, survive monstrous hordes by night! Plant flowers to attract danger, unlock powerful upgrades, and defend your land in this vibrant roguelike with building, farming, and strategic chaos!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build a thriving garden by day, survive monstrous hordes by night! Plant flowers to attract danger, unlock powerful upgrades, and defend your land in this vibrant roguelike with building, farming, and strategic chaos!
